Articles.Content:
As everyone knows; it's sad to watch a craft you worked on all day, just to see it smash into the ground in a ball of flames, but one day while trying to send a drone to the Mun, the drone runs out of electricity while attempting to save itself from smashing into the Mun; so I take decided to take the enjoyment of watching smash itself on the lunar surface, but when it did; it just disappeared with a "boom"... The next day I decided to put the cheats on to goof around with the designs; I made tiny (Viper like) spacecraft and purposely stalled it (took a cool picture of it too)...

Then when it hit ground it bounced up like a ball, so i relaunched it and tried again, but it still exploded...

Sadly, I love watching parts go all over the place like in this video:

So I decided to come up with this concept:

So, are you guys going to help?
Cool idea and all, and I wish I could help. But seriously, I just commented here to say that that video is freaking awesome.
so basically you just want to cheat and give every part a ridiculously high impact tolerance? just go and edit all the .cfg's for the parts.
I think he wants to see a spray of debris. It's less about cheating and more about visuals.
